results.purpose: Tracks CMA (Customer, Menu & Acquisition) squad organization, including team structure, KPIs, leadership, and communication channels for Q1 2026
key_data_points: Q1 2026 KPIs defined for each squad
Net Revenue (Good Chop, The Pets Table)
Daily active users to monthly active users ratio (Act squad)
Organic app downloads from sharing features (Share squad)

entities.name: Shopping Journey
entities.context: Tribe containing Customer Profile, Menu Discovery, Merchandising, and Feedback squads

entities.name: Shopping Foundation
entities.context: Tribe containing Personalization, Cart, Shopping Platform, Customer Service Experience, and Cross Selling squads

entities.name: New Ventures
entities.context: Tribe managing Factor Form, Good Chop, The Pets Table, and Market Innovation

entities.name: Consumer Core
entities.context: Tribe focused on API-v2 migration for Customers, Plans, Deliveries & Orders, and Monoliths

entities.name: Consumer Foundations
entities.context: Tribe with Consumer Acceleration and Client Platform squads

entities.name: Engagement
entities.context: Tribe with Inspire and Act squads focused on app engagement

entities.name: Loyalty & Virality
entities.context: Tribe managing Share, Missions, and Rewards squads

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: New venture with dedicated squad, website at factor75.com/factorform

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: New venture tracked by Net Revenue KPI, website at goodchop.com

entities.name: The Pets Table
entities.context: Pet food venture tracked by Net Revenue, website at thepetstable.com

entities.name: Fiona Lucas
entities.context: PM for multiple Consumer Core squads (Customers, Plans, Deliveries & Orders, Monoliths)

entities.name: InComm
entities.context: Integration partner for HelloFresh retail gift card program mentioned in email notes

insights: Organization uses tribe/squad structure with clear PM and EM ownership for each squad
Heavy focus on conversion metrics (Add-to-Cart rates, completion rates) across Shopping Journey squads
Consumer Core tribe is undergoing API-v2 migration with KPIs tracking endpoint migration progress
New Ventures tribe manages multiple brand initiatives (Factor, Good Chop, Pets Table) with revenue-focused KPIs
Engagement and Loyalty tribes focus on app-based metrics (downloads, active users, mission completion)
Some squads have missing Jira links or incomplete backlog information
UX tribe (Insights & Innovation, Content Design & Localization) has incomplete information with no assigned PM/EM
Multiple squads share 'Shopping Foundation & Customer Care' context, suggesting cross-functional collaboration
Email context shows active integration work with InComm for gift card program and various squad sync meetings
